00041 #include <stdio.h>

00053 void MSD_execNameCentroDeGravidade(void)
00054 {
00055    char   name[12];
00056    vector centro;
00057 
00058    while (1 != sscanf(restbuf, "%s", name))
00059    {
00060       printf("CentroG: Nome");
00061       if (!lineins("? "))
00062       {
00063          return;
00064       }
00065    }
00066    MSD_highNameCentroDeGravidade(name, centro);
00067    printf("Solido tem centro de gravidade %f %f %f\n", centro[0],
00068           centro[1],
00069           centro[2]);
00070 }
00071 
00072 int MSD_highNameCentroDeGravidade(char *name, vector vec)
00073 {
00074    int sn;
00075 
00076    if ((sn = MSD_getSolidIdFromName(name)) == -1)
00077    {
00078       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NaoEncontrouSolidNome, NAM_CentroGravidade, name);
00079       return(ERROR);
00080    }
00081    return(MSD_highCentroCarena(sn, vec));
00082 }
00083 
00084 int MSD_highCentroDeGravidade(Id sn, vector vec)
00085 {
00086    SPTYPE s;
00087 
00088    if ((s = MSD_getSolid(sn)) == SNIL)
00089    {
00090       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NaoEncontrouSolido, NAM_CentroGravidade, sn);
00091       return(ERROR);
00092    }
00093    return(MSD_lowCentroDeGravidade(s, vec));
00094 }
00095 
00096 /* Calculate signed cent of mass of a solid */
00097 int MSD_lowCentroDeGravidade(SPTYPE s, vector centg)
00098 {
00099    DPTYPE dg;
00100    FPTYPE f;
00101    LPTYPE l;
00102    HPTYPE he1;
00103    HPTYPE he2;
00104    vector a, b, c, d, cen;
00105    real   volume;
00106 
00107    veczer(centg);
00108    veczer(cen);
00109    veczer(a);
00110    veczer(b);
00111    veczer(c);
00112 
00113    for (AllShellsSolid(s, dg))
00114    {
00115       for (AllFacesShell(dg, f))
00116       {
00117          for (AllLoopsFace(f, l))
00118          {
00119             he1 = LooLEdg(l);
00120             he2 = HalNxt(he1);
00121             do
00122             {
00123                vecminus(a, VerVCoord(HalVtx(he2)), cen);
00124                vecminus(b, VerVCoord(HalVtx(he1)), cen);
00125                cross(c, a, b);
00126                vecminus(d, VerVCoord(HalVtx(HalNxt(he2))), cen);
00127                centg[0] += dot(d, c) * (a[0] + b[0] + d[0]);
00128                centg[1] += dot(d, c) * (a[1] + b[1] + d[1]);
00129                centg[2] += dot(d, c) * (a[2] + b[2] + d[2]);
00130             } while ((he2 = HalNxt(he2)) != he1);
00131          }
00132       }
00133    }
00134 
00135    volume   = MSD_lowVolume(s) * 24.0;
00136    centg[0] = -centg[0] / volume;
00137    centg[1] = -centg[1] / volume;
00138    centg[2] = -centg[2] / volume;
00139    return(SUCCESS);
00140 }
